TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CommonObjectSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class CommonObjectSecurity Inherits ObjectSecurity

summary.span: 无需直接操作访问控制列表 (ACL) 而控制对对象的访问。

span.span: Controls access to objects without direct manipulation of access control lists (ACLs).

summary.span: 此类是 类的抽象基类。

span.span: This class is the abstract base class for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isContainer) cil managed

param.name: isContainer
param.span: 如果新对象是一个容器对象，则为 。

span.span: if the new object is a container object.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to add.

summary.span: 将指定的访问规则添加到与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL)。

span.span: Adds the specified access rule to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加访问规则可能导致现有的访问规则要合并的 DACL 中。Adding an access rule might cause existing access rules in the DACL to be merged. 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void AddAuditRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的审核规则。

span.span: The audit rule to add.

summary.span: 将指定的审核规则添加到与该 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL)。

span.span: Adds the specified audit rule to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加的审核规则可能导致现有的访问规则要合并的 SACL 中。Adding an audit rule might cause existing access rules in the SACL to be merged.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.AccessControl.AuthorizationRuleCollection GetAccessRules (bool includeExplicit, bool includeInherited, Type targetType);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.AccessControl.AuthorizationRuleCollection GetAccessRules(bool includeExplicit, bool includeInherited, class System.Type targetType) cil managed
Public Function GetAccessRules (includeExplicit As Boolean, includeInherited As Boolean, targetType As Type) As AuthorizationRuleCollection
public: System::Security::AccessControl::AuthorizationRuleCollection ^ GetAccessRules(bool includeExplicit, bool includeInherited, Type ^ targetType);

param.name: includeExplicit
param.span: 若要包括为对象显式设置的访问规则，则为 。

span.span: to include access rules explicitly set for the object.

param.name: includeInherited
param.span: 若要包括继承的访问规则，则为 。

span.span: to include inherited access rules.

param.name: targetType
param.span: 指定要为其检索访问规则的安全标识符是属于 T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier 类型，还是属于 T:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount 类型。

span.span: Specifies whether the security identifier for which to retrieve access rules is of type T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier or type T:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.

param.span: 此参数的值所隶属的类型必须要能转换为 类型。

span.span: The value of this parameter must be a type that can be translated to the type.

summary.span: 获取与指定的安全性标识符关联的访问规则的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the access rules associated with the specified security identifier.

returns.span: 与指定的 对象关联的访问规则的集合。

span.span: The collection of access rules associated with the specified object.

summary.span: 将指定的修改应用到与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中。

span.span: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: 如果已成功修改 DACL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed
Protected Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As AccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to remove.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除与指定的访问规则具有相同安全性标识符和访问掩码的访问规则。

span.span: Removes access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: 如果访问规则已成功移除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the access rule was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问删除通过使用复杂的算法可能会添加除了删除它们的访问控制规则。Access removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add access control rules in addition to removing them. 此方法无法移除访问规则，并返回`false`如果与访问规则关联的继承规则而言过于复杂，若要成功执行的删除算法。This method fails to remove the access rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the access rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed. 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleAll(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to remove.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除与指定的访问规则具有相同安全性标识符的所有访问规则。

span.span: Removes all access rules that have the same security identifier as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to remove.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除与指定的访问规则完全匹配的所有访问规则。

span.span: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance bool RemoveAuditRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed
Protected Function RemoveAuditRule (rule As AuditRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的审核规则。

span.span: The audit rule to remove.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中移除与指定的审核规则具有相同安全性标识符和访问掩码的审核规则。

span.span: Removes audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: 如果审核规则已成功移除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the audit rule was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 审核删除通过使用复杂的算法可能会添加审核控制规则，除了删除它们。Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add audit control rules in addition to removing them. 此方法无法移除审核规则，并返回`false`如果与审核规则关联的继承规则而言过于复杂，若要成功执行的删除算法。This method fails to remove the audit rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the audit rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的审核规则。

span.span: The audit rule to remove.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中移除与指定的审核规则具有相同安全性标识符的所有审核规则。

span.span: Removes all audit rules that have the same security identifier as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的审核规则。

span.span: The audit rule to remove.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中移除与指定的审核规则完全匹配的所有审核规则。

span.span: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要重置的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to reset.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除所有访问规则，然后添加指定的访问规则。

span.span: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要设置的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to set.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除与指定的访问规则具有相同安全性标识符和限定符的所有访问规则，然后添加指定的访问规则。

span.span: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified access rule in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免无意中允许主体访问，应用程序应检查是否存在允许每个人都完全访问权限 (AEFA) 访问控制项 (ACE)，并将其删除才能修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetAuditRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要设置的审核规则。

span.span: The audit rule to set.

summary.span: 从与此 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中移除与指定的审核规则具有相同的安全性标识符和限定符所有审核规则，然后添加指定的审核规则。

span.span: Removes all audit rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified audit rule in the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified audit rule.
